lead_paragraph: France is a nation divided by food, an observation best made by Charles de Gaulle when he quipped: "How can you govern a country that has 246 varieties of cheese?"
snippet: France is a nation divided by food. Happily, two Paris food festivals this month will strive to unite the country -- gastronomically, at least -- by gathering food producers from all corners of France.

headline.main: At Paris Food Fairs, Focus on Artisans and Authenticity

abstract: France is a nation divided by food. Happily, two Paris food festivals this month will strive to unite the country -- gastronomically, at least -- by gathering food producers from all corners of France.
